text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { int i , j , n , z , b , k , e [ 1000 ] , l , q ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( " %d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } e [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; k = 0 ; z = 0 ; l = 1 ; b = 0 ; q = 2 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( z == 2 ) { z = 0 ; b ++ ; k ++ ; if ( b == q ) { j = j - q ; q = q * 2 ; } else { j = j - 1 ; } } e [ l ] = e [ k ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; l = l + 1 ; z ++ ; } z = 0 ; k ++ ; q = 2 ; b = 0 ; } i = 0 ; int c ; int u = ( 2 ^ n ) ; l = l - 1 ; c = e [ l ] ; while ( l > 0 ) { if ( e [ l ] > c ) { c = e [ l ] ; } l -- ; i ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; t -- ; } return ( 0 ) ; }

children.text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { int i , j , n , z , b , k , e [ 1000 ] , l , q ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( " %d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } e [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; k = 0 ; z = 0 ; l = 1 ; b = 0 ; q = 2 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( z == 2 ) { z = 0 ; b ++ ; k ++ ; if ( b == q ) { j = j - q ; q = q * 2 ; } else { j = j - 1 ; } } e [ l ] = e [ k ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; l = l + 1 ; z ++ ; } z = 0 ; k ++ ; q = 2 ; b = 0 ; } i = 0 ; int c ; int u = ( 2 ^ n ) ; l = l - 1 ; c = e [ l ] ; while ( l > 0 ) { if ( e [ l ] > c ) { c = e [ l ] ; } l -- ; i ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; t -- ; } return ( 0 ) ; }
int i , j , n , z , b , k , e [ 1000 ] , l , q ;
for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( " %d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; }
if ( b == q ) { j = j - q ; q = q * 2 ; } else { j = j - 1 ; }
e [ l ] = e [ k ] + a [ i ] [ j ]
while ( l > 0 ) { if ( e [ l ] > c ) { c = e [ l ] ; } l -- ; i ++ ; }
if ( e [ l ] > c ) { c = e [ l ] ; }
